From: "Carnage darkness" <carnage_blood@...>



* Carnage snarled and transformed, what did this clone think...that she had 
just become an assassin over night? She had had her own share of torture 
from the Predacons, the end result was a deadly weapon that just didn't give 
a nano what it killed...just as long as it did kill.
She snarled...*

" Get your butt back here! You aren't the only bot that has the scars of 
torment on her body! I know what it's like, I have just learned to forget 
it! Forget it all!! I had to, other wise I would be just as you said, dead!"

* Carnage let her voice die away, weather Cyber Claw had heard her or not 
she didn't know. But she knew how she felt, she knew all to well.
But Carnage was glad that at least Cyber Claw had been made as a grown bot 
and had only had that many years of torture, she hadn't been that lucky. She 
had felt the wrath of an entire Predacon fleet when she was only 5, the same 
fleet that had turned her into the assassin that she was today.
Carnage watched Cyber Claw fly off into the distance now she felt alone, 
even with Teltoli's company. Now she knew that she wasn't the only one that 
had the scars of torture, but it was a pain to know that another had to go 
through what she did.
Carnage looked back at the disappearing form of Cyber Claw...*

" Please come back."
